LanguageData.InsanityLiquid.label: insanity liquid
LanguageData.InsanityLiquid.description: Blue liquid with psychic effect. Victim became berserk. Explodes when touched by fire.

LanguageData.TranquilizerLiquid.label: tranquilizer liquid
